parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.52</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns all magazines of given turret. Use turret path [-1] for driver's turret. Alternatively, use [[magazinesAllTurrets]].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> When main syntax is used, command excludes empty magazines for driver turret [-1] but returns empty magazines for all other turrets. Since Arma 3 v2.01.146669 alternative syntax is available that makes empty magazine handling optional and consistent.</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''magazinesTurret''' turretPath</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[String|Strings]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value>vehicle '''magazinesTurret''' [turretPath, includeEmpty]&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(Since Arma 3 v2.01.146669)</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [turretPath, includeEmpty]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]] - turret path </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> includeEmpty (Optional): [[Bool]], [[true]] - include empty magazines, [[false]] - exclude empty magazines, not defined - old behavior (see description)</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER24</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value>[[Array]] of [[String|Strings]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_mags = [[vehicle]] [[player]] [[magazinesTurret]] [0, 0];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_mags = _tank [[magazinesTurret]] [0];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[magazinesAllTurrets]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[removeMagazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazineTurret]], [[weaponsTurret]], [[loadMagazine]], [[magazines]], [[magazinesDetail]],  [[magazinesAmmo]], [[magazinesAmmoFull]], [[addWeaponTurret]], [[removeWeaponTurret]], [[turretLocal]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
